title: Stem cell research for cystic fibrosis leaps forward

title_detail.value: Stem cell research for cystic fibrosis leaps forward

summary: The fight against cystic fibrosis has taken a major step forward, with new research showing that cells causing the debilitating genetic disorder could be successfully replaced with healthy ones.

summary_detail.value: The fight against cystic fibrosis has taken a major step forward, with new research showing that cells causing the debilitating genetic disorder could be successfully replaced with healthy ones.
